00077             Unknown         = /*  -1, */  saga::name_space::Unknown       ,
00078             None            = /*   0, */  saga::name_space::None          ,

00080             Recursive       = /*   2, */  saga::name_space::Recursive     ,
00081             Dereference     = /*   4, */  saga::name_space::Dereference,
00082             Create          = /*   8, */  saga::name_space::Create        ,
00083             Exclusive       = /*  16, */  saga::name_space::Exclusive     ,
00084             Lock            = /*  32, */  saga::name_space::Lock          ,
00085             CreateParents   = /*  64, */  saga::name_space::CreateParents ,

00088             Read            =    512,
00089             Write           =   1024,
00090             ReadWrite       =   Read | Write
00091             // 2048, reserved for Binary
00092         };
